item.description:
We haven't done this in a couple of years, but the chance is back to help with Foodshare's Turkey and a Twenty drive. The Turkey and a Twenty campaign is a region-wide effort to collect enough donated turkeys to make sure that everyone who needs a little help gets it this Thanksgiving and to raise money to help Foodshare feed people in need all year long.

This year, we will cover the collection point at the Highland Park Market in Coventry from 11:00 to 2:00. This drive is in conjunction with WDRC-FM, the oldies station, and some of the station personnel should also be on site with us.

We will be working in the front of the store, accepting donations from people, and putting the turkeys in bins, the other food in separate bins, and the cash donations in a cash box. We'll also hand out thank you cards and stickers.

Not clear if we will be inside or outside the store, but will update if I find out. Otherwise, dress in layers and warm enough to work outside if need be.

For those interested, we might stop for a late lunch when we are done.
item.name: Foodshare's Turkey and a Twenty drive
